message_history.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Identify the feature-length animated films produced by Walt Disney Animation Studios and released in the U.S. regular theaters from January 1, 2000 through December 31, 2024 (inclusively). For each film, include the official theatrical release date (not the premiere date) in the U.S. in the "Month Day, Year" format (e.g., May 19, 2000), the awards and nominations the film itself has received. Do not include the awards or nominations won by individuals such as company, producers, directors, musicians and editing-related personnel.

Present the data in one Markdown table with columns: Film Title, Release Date, Nominations, Awards

Note: If no award information can be found, indicate as NA.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

<think>
To start, I need to list all feature-length animated films produced by Walt Disney Animation Studios within the specified period. Then, I'll collect their release dates in the U.S. and the awards and nominations they received.
</think>

<search> Walt Disney Animation Studios feature-length animated films from 2000 to 2024 </search>

Search query: Walt Disney Animation Studios feature-length animated films from 2000 to 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Disney_theatrical_animated_feature_films):
List of Disney theatrical animated feature films - Wikipedia This list of theatrical animated films consists of animated films produced or released by The Walt Disney Studios, the film division of The Walt Disney ...

[Doc 2](https://disneyanimation.com/films/):
Feature Films - Walt Disney Animation Studios 100 Years of Storytelling · Moana 2 · Wish · Strange World · Encanto · Raya and the Last Dragon · Frozen 2 · Ralph Breaks the Internet · Moana.

[Doc 3](https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/List_of_Disney_theatrical_animated_features):
List of Disney theatrical animated features The following list shows all the fully animated films produced by Walt Disney Animation Studios, beginning with Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs.

I will use these references to compile the necessary information for each film.

<search> Release Dates of Walt Disney Animated Films from 2000 to 2024 </search>

Search query: Release Dates of Walt Disney Animated Films from 2000 to 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Walt_Disney_Animation_Studios_films):
List of Walt Disney Animation Studios films - Wikipedia Released films ; Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, December 21, 1937 ; Pinocchio, February 7, 1940 ; Fantasia, November 13, 1940 ; Dumbo, October 23, 1941 ; Bambi ...

[Doc 2](https://disneyanimation.com/films/):
Feature Films - Walt Disney Animation Studios Walt Disney Animation Studios released its first fully animated feature film, Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, pioneering a new form of family entertainment.

[Doc 3](https://www.imdb.com/list/ls093653710/):
Disney Animated Movies in Chronological Order - IMDb Release calendarTop 250 moviesMost popular moviesBrowse movies by genreTop ... Humorist Robert Benchley learns about the animation process at Walt Disney ...

This document provides a structured list which includes release dates.

<search> Awards and nominations for Walt Disney Animated Films from 2000 to 2024 </search>

Search query: Awards and nominations for Walt Disney Animated Films from 2000 to 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Academy_Awards_won_by_Walt_Disney_Pictures):
Academy Awards won by Walt Disney Pictures | Disney Wiki - Fandom Awards won ; 1987, The Color of Money, Best Actor in a leading role ; 1989, Tin Toy, Best Animated Short Film ; 1989 · Who Framed Roger Rabbit, Best Film Editing

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Walt_Disney_Animation_Studios_films):
List of Walt Disney Animation Studios films - Wikipedia ^ "The 72nd Academy Awards (2000) Nominees and Winners". Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences (AMPAS). Archived from the original on November 9, 2014.

[Doc 3](https://d23.com/a-to-z/academy-awards/):
Academy Awards - D23 As of 2025, Disney has received a total of 151 Academy Awards, but the impressive number is that of these, 32 were won by Walt Disney personally.
